basics.name: Kristine Orpilla
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

work.position: VISTA Summer Associate - Early College Tutor
highlights: Utilized Google Workspace (Gmail, Drive, Meet, Docs, Sheets, Slides, Forms) in order to assist students with their summer classes
Facilitated group sessions with the students to share reminders and announcements

volunteer.summary: Participate in volunteer events planned by the organization
